CustomField.formula: CASE( BNR_Comment_Origination_Code__c , "AD","Admissions", "FS","Faculty Services", "ALUM","Alumni Affairs", "SS","Student Services", "ORC","Office of Regs & Compliance", "STR","Student Records Office", "EXA","Exams & Assessments", "VISA","Visa Compliance", "INTA","International Admissions", "GRAD","Graduation Team", "LST","Learning Support Team", "MIT","Management Information Team", "MRK","Marking", "VLE","Virtual Learning Environment", "ARS","AR System", "ECO","Ecommerce", "SMC","Student Management Centre", "" )
CustomField.label: Comment Origination Code Display
